SEARCH:
Package ch.zhaw.card2brain.services

Schnittstelle CardService

Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
CardServiceImpl
public interface CardService
CardService is an interface that defines the methods to perform CRUD operations on Card objects.
Seit:
16.01.2023

  • Methodendetails

    • addCard

      Card addCard(Card card)
      Adds a Card object to the database.
      Parameter:
      card - The card object to be added
      Gibt zurück:
      The Card object that was added

    • updateCard

      Card updateCard(Card card)
      Updates an existing Card object in the database.
      Parameter:
      card - The card object to be updated
      Gibt zurück:
      The updated Card object

    • deleteCard

      void deleteCard(Card card)
      Deletes a Card object from the database.
      Parameter:
      card - The card object to be deleted

    • deleteCardsOfACategory

      void deleteCardsOfACategory(Category category)
      Deletes all Card objects of a specific Category from the database.
      Parameter:
      category - The category whose cards are to be deleted

    • getAllCardsOfACategory

      List<Card> getAllCardsOfACategory(Category category)
      Retrieves all Card objects of a specific Category from the database.
      Parameter:
      category - The category whose cards are to be retrieved
      Gibt zurück:
      A List of Card objects belonging to the specified category

    • getAllCardsOfACategoryById

      List<Card> getAllCardsOfACategoryById(long categoryId)
      Retrieves all Card objects of a specific Category from the database by category ID.
      Parameter:
      categoryId - The ID of the category whose cards are to be retrieved
      Gibt zurück:
      A List of Card objects belonging to the specified category

    • getCard

      Card getCard(Long cardId) throws CardNotFoundException
      Retrieves a single Card object from the database by its ID.
      Parameter:
      cardId - The ID of the card to be retrieved
      Gibt zurück:
      The Card object with the specified ID
      Löst aus:
      CardNotFoundException - if the card with the specified ID cannot be found

    • getCardsForRepetition

      List<Card> getCardsForRepetition(long categoryID)
      Retrieves a List of Card objects for repetition based on a category ID.
      Parameter:
      categoryID - The ID of the category whose cards are to be retrieved for repetition
      Gibt zurück:
      A List of Card objects for repetition

    • repeated

      void repeated(Card card, boolean rightAnswer)
      Marks a Card object as repeated, based on whether the user answered correctly.
      Parameter:
      card - The Card object to be marked as repeated
      rightAnswer - A boolean value indicating whether the user answered correctly

    • getCardsForRepetition

      List<Card> getCardsForRepetition(Category category)
      Retrieves a List of Card objects for repetition based on a Category object.
      Parameter:
      category - The Category whose cards are to be retrieved for repetition
      Gibt zurück:
      A List of Card objects for repetition

    • isCardValid

      boolean isCardValid(Card card)
